title: cant make rp purchase keeps saying "error try again later"
body:
ive never had this problem before with any other cards maybe is it because its a walmart money card? does the game not accept those?
please help.

replies.body: They may not have activated the card to be honest with you! It's always good to go back and make sure they did, but you can also [ticket our billing team ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so we can take a closer look into what's going on.

Since there's no Walmart here, I had to look into their MoneyCard, and it seems that it's just the same as any Prepaid Visa or Prepaid MasterCard, so I'd assume  it shouldn't be an issue. Are you certain that the card is activated and has the full amount of funds on the card? 

Some cards need to be activated online before making online purchases, and usually the instructions are on the back of the card for how to do that. 

I'm assuming you've entered the information correctly and have double checked it, but that's another possibility.

How many RP purchases have you made recently? I've been locked out of purchases before for making too many purchases within a certain time frame, and had to wait a few days for it to clear before being allowed to make another purchase.

yes im almost certain i activated it and did it online aswell, it has 50$ on it.
i havent made any recent rp purchases. do you think i maybe because i have too many cards saved on my account already or maybe it could be that i tried to spend money a few mins after i activated the card maybe i shouldve givin it a little time first
